name: ebook_learning_and_analysis
description: Enables AI to learn from ebooks, providing insights, summaries, and knowledge extraction.

learning_goals.description: Specific goals or areas of focus for learning (e.g., extracting key concepts, summarizing chapters, understanding domain-specific knowledge).

ebook_file_paths.description: Paths to the ebook files that should be analyzed and learned from.

feedback_enabled.description: Whether the AI should provide feedback on what it has learned and suggest insights based on the analysis.
